snippet.title: Automate It - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Automate It offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and resource management in a dynamic, industrial setting. Construct intricate infrastructures using conveyor belts, machinery, and automation to overcome challenges and maximize efficiency. Check out the Automate It trailer to see gameplay and more ahead of its release on Steam, Epic Games Store, and Nintendo Switch.
